Package no.ntnu.iir.bluej.extensions.linting.core.handlers

Class PackageEventHandler

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.iir.bluej.extensions.linting.core.handlers.PackageEventHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
bluej.extensions2.event.PackageListener
public class PackageEventHandler extends Object implements bluej.extensions2.event.PackageListener
Represents a Package event handler. Responsible for listening to Package Events within BlueJ. Spawns a new window every time a project is opened.
